title: $215.14 Million in Sales Expected for Bancorpsouth Bank (BXS) This Quarter
content: Equities analysts expect Bancorpsouth Bank (NYSE:BXS) to post sales of $215.14 million for the current quarter, Zacks reports. Five analysts have provided estimates for Bancorpsouth Bank’s earnings. The lowest sales estimate is $211.60 million and the highest is $219.00 million. Bancorpsouth Bank reported sales of $185.61 million in the same quarter last year, which would suggest a positive year over year growth rate of 15.9%. The business is expected to report its next earnings results  on Wednesday, July 18th.    According to Zacks, analysts expect that Bancorpsouth Bank will report full-year sales of $874.94 million for the current financial year, with estimates ranging from $860.80 million to $883.50 million. For the next year, analysts anticipate that the business will report sales of $946.98 million per share, with estimates ranging from $935.40 million to $964.30 million. Zacks Investment Research’s sales calculations are an average based on a survey of sell-side research firms that follow Bancorpsouth Bank.    Bancorpsouth Bank (NYSE:BXS) last announced its quarterly earnings results on Wednesday, April 18th. The bank reported $0.54 EPS for the quarter, beating the Zacks’ consensus estimate of $0.52 by $0.02. Bancorpsouth Bank had a return on equity of 9.49% and a net margin of 20.58%. The firm had revenue of $217.01 million for the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $210.65 million. During the same period last year, the firm posted $0.39 earnings per share.    A number of analysts have recently commented on BXS shares. ValuEngine lowered Bancorpsouth Bank from a “buy” rating to a “hold” rating in a research note on Monday, April 2nd. Brean Capital  reissued a “hold” rating on shares of Bancorpsouth Bank in a research note on Monday, April 16th. Zacks Investment Research lowered Bancorpsouth Bank from a “hold” rating to a “sell” rating in a research note on Tuesday, March 13th. Stephens  reissued a “buy” rating and set a $36.00 price target on shares of Bancorpsouth Bank in a research note on Friday, April 20th. Finally, Royal Bank of Canada  reissued a “hold” rating and set a $37.00 price target on shares of Bancorpsouth Bank in a research note on Friday, April 20th. One research analyst  has rated the stock with a sell rating, nine have given a hold rating and one  has issued  a buy rating to the company’s stock. The stock  has an average rating of “Hold” and a consensus price target of $35.00.  Shares of BXS stock traded up $0.50 during mid-day trading on Monday, reaching $34.00. 534,140 shares of the stock traded hands, compared to its average volume of 691,123. Bancorpsouth Bank has a 1-year low of $27.20 and a 1-year high of $35.55. The firm has a market capitalization of $3.08 billion, a price-to-earnings ratio of 20.36 and a beta of 1.42. The company has a current ratio of 0.85, a quick ratio of 0.84 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.02.    The business also recently disclosed a quarterly dividend, which will be paid on Monday, July 2nd. Investors of record on Friday, June 15th will be paid a $0.14 dividend. This represents a $0.56 dividend on an annualized basis and a dividend yield of 1.65%. The ex-dividend date of this dividend is Thursday, June 14th. Bancorpsouth Bank’s dividend payout ratio  is currently 33.53%.    Several institutional investors have recently bought and sold shares of the stock. Principal Financial Group Inc. increased its holdings in  Bancorpsouth Bank by 2.8% in the first quarter. Principal Financial Group Inc. now owns 364,756 shares of the bank’s stock worth $11,599,000 after purchasing an additional 9,767 shares in the last quarter.  Wesbanco Bank Inc. bought a new stake in  Bancorpsouth Bank in the first quarter worth approximately $742,000.  Xact Kapitalforvaltning AB increased its holdings in  Bancorpsouth Bank by 58.0% in the first quarter. Xact Kapitalforvaltning AB now owns 12,260 shares of the bank’s stock worth $390,000 after purchasing an additional 4,500 shares in the last quarter.  Legal & General Group Plc increased its holdings in  Bancorpsouth Bank by 16.2% in the first quarter. Legal & General Group Plc now owns 85,360 shares of the bank’s stock worth $2,714,000 after purchasing an additional 11,913 shares in the last quarter.  Finally, LPL Financial LLC increased its holdings in  Bancorpsouth Bank by 153.8% in the first quarter. LPL Financial LLC now owns 36,738 shares of the bank’s stock worth $1,168,000 after purchasing an additional 22,261 shares in the last quarter. 70.63% of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors.    Bancorpsouth Bank Company Profile    BancorpSouth Bank operates as a financial holding company for BancorpSouth Bank that provides commercial banking and financial services to individuals and small-to-medium size businesses. It offers various deposit products, including interest and noninterest bearing demand deposits, and saving and other time deposits.
